Major_Arcs.title: The Circus Strongman and the Arsonist
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc follows Paul Bunyan's unexpected involvement in a circus, where he becomes the new strongman and thwarts the vengeful schemes of his predecessor, Matto Grasso.

sub_scenes.title: Introduction to Paul Bunyan at the Circus
sub_scenes.description: This scene introduces Paul Bunyan as a circus performer and sets the stage for the circus narrative.

sub_scenes.title: Intervention and Confrontation with Billings
sub_scenes.description: This scene depicts Paul Bunyan's intervention in a conflict within the circus tent and his confrontation with Billings.

sub_scenes.title: Matto Grasso's Jealousy and Arson Attempt
sub_scenes.description: This scene focuses on Matto Grasso's envy and his plan to sabotage Paul Bunyan's performance by setting fire to the circus tent.

narrative_arcs.title: Paul Bunyan's Acclaimed Performance and Matto Grasso's Jealousy

sub_scenes.title: Gigantico's Release and the Chase for Matto Grasso
sub_scenes.description: This scene depicts Matto Grasso's next attempt at sabotage by releasing Gigantico, followed by a chase through the circus arena.

narrative_arcs.title: Matto Grasso's New Scheme: Releasing Gigantico
Gigantico's Escape and Paul Bunyan's Swift Action
Continued Escape and Second Weight Attempt

sub_scenes.title: Final Confrontation and Departure
sub_scenes.description: This scene concludes the conflict as Paul Bunyan captures Matto Grasso and resolves the circus drama, ultimately deciding to return to his life in the North Woods.

narrative_arcs.title: Spectator Observation and Paul Bunyan's Threat

Major_Arcs.title: Marco Polo's Tibetan Adventure
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc recounts one of Marco Polo's perilous adventures in Tibet, involving a talking severed head, a sacred dagger, and an encounter with the Ogress of Tibet while searching for Princess Lotus.

sub_scenes.title: Tibetan Encounter and the Severed Head
sub_scenes.description: This scene introduces Marco Polo's Tibetan adventure and a bizarre encounter with a talking severed head.

sub_scenes.title: The Sacred Dagger and Journey to Hi-Toun
sub_scenes.description: This scene involves Marco Polo receiving a magical dagger and his journey to the city of Hi-Toun, initially mistaking mourning for celebration.

narrative_arcs.title: Arrival at Hi-Toun and Misinterpretation of Festivities

sub_scenes.title: The King's Plea and Marco's Agreement
sub_scenes.description: This scene details Marco Polo's arrival in Hi-Toun and the King's desperate plea for help to find his missing daughter, Princess Lotus.

narrative_arcs.title: Marco's Introduction and the King's Welcome
The King's Plea for Help Regarding Princess Lotus
Marco's Agreement to Help Find Princess Lotus

sub_scenes.title: Encounter with the Ogress of Tibet
sub_scenes.description: This scene describes Marco Polo's encounter with a mourning woman who turns out to be the Ogress of Tibet, leading to his capture.

narrative_arcs.title: Encounter with a Mourning Woman in Need
The Mourning Woman's Plea and the Ominous Destination
Entering the Mysterious Castle and the Rat Revelation
The Ogress's Transformation and Marco's Imprisonment
Confrontation with Giant Rats and the Ogress

sub_scenes.title: Ogre's Dungeon and Princess's Reunion (Misplaced Narrative)
sub_scenes.description: This scene appears to be a separate, possibly misplaced narrative segment about prisoners escaping an ogre, which is oddly inserted within Marco Polo's story.

narrative_arcs.title: The Special Knife and Ogre's Defeat
Escape from Dungeon with Magic Knife
Misunderstood Mourning and Arrival at Palace

Major_Arcs.title: The Treasure of Agra and Jordan's Revenge
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc tells a tale of betrayal and revenge centered around a hidden treasure in Agra, India, and the relentless pursuit of justice by the betrayed prisoner, Jordan.

sub_scenes.title: Treasure Keeper's Prologue and Penal Colony Introduction
sub_scenes.description: This scene sets the stage with an introduction by the Treasure Keeper and establishes the setting in a British penal colony.

narrative_arcs.title: Officer's Request to Speak with Captain Brooking

sub_scenes.title: The Treasure Bargain and Captain's Betrayal
sub_scenes.description: This scene depicts the prisoner Jordan's desperate bargain with Captain Brooking, revealing the treasure and leading to betrayal.

narrative_arcs.title: The Revelation of Treasure and Desperate Bargain
The Agreement and Promise of Escape
Release from Prison and Return to England
Return to England and Renewed Vengeance

sub_scenes.title: Confrontation and Midnight Meeting
sub_scenes.description: This scene depicts Jordan's arrival in England and his confrontation with Captain Brooking, leading to a secretive midnight meeting.

narrative_arcs.title: Arrival in England and Continued Vigil

sub_scenes.title: Attic Betrayal and Tragic End
sub_scenes.description: This scene reveals a separate treasure-related betrayal in an attic, leading to violence and police intervention, concluded with a moral reflection.

narrative_arcs.title: Journey to the Attic and Treasure Reveal
The Wounded Man and the Chest

Major_Arcs.title: The Haunted Matthews Estate and Rosalind's Forgiveness
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc centers around the haunted Matthews Estate, investigated by Henry Northrup, and the resolution of the haunting through forgiveness and brotherly love.

sub_scenes.title: Introduction to Dr. Styx and the Haunted Estate
sub_scenes.description: This scene introduces Dr. Styx's violent act and Vincent Matthews' sentencing, setting the stage for the haunted estate narrative.

sub_scenes.title: Northrup Accepts the Case and Arrives at the Estate
sub_scenes.description: This scene shows Dr. Styx enlisting Henry Northrup to investigate the haunted Matthews Estate, and Northrup's arrival at the ominous location.

narrative_arcs.title: Arrival at Matthews Place and Ominous Warning

sub_scenes.title: Confrontation with Vincent Matthews' Ghost
sub_scenes.description: This scene depicts Henry Northrup's entry into the Matthews Estate and his immediate confrontation with the ghostly Vincent Matthews.

narrative_arcs.title: Ignoring the Warning and Entering the House

sub_scenes.title: Rosalind's Forgiveness and Spiritual Release
sub_scenes.description: This scene resolves the haunting as Rosalind Matthews is summoned and offers forgiveness and brotherly love, releasing the tormented spirits.

narrative_arcs.title: The Revelation of the Murdered Sister
Return to the House and Explanation

Major_Arcs.title: Henry Hudson's Ill-Fated Voyages
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc recounts the historical tragedy of Henry Hudson's voyages in search of the Northwest Passage, culminating in mutiny and his mysterious disappearance.

sub_scenes.title: The Dutch Commission and Initial Voyage
sub_scenes.description: This scene introduces Henry Hudson and the Dutch East India Company's commission for him to find the Northwest Passage.

narrative_arcs.title: The Dutch East India Company's Proposal to Hudson
Entering the Hudson River with Hope
Hudson's Acceptance of Failure and Decision to Return Home

sub_scenes.title: The Arctic Voyage and Mutiny
sub_scenes.description: This scene details Hudson's second, disastrous voyage to the Arctic, leading to mutiny and his tragic fate.

Major_Arcs.title: The Arabian Knight and the Tatar Rescue
Major_Arcs.description: This major arc follows Hassan, the Arabian Knight, on a mission to rescue a kidnapped woman from the Tatar horsemen and their one-eyed leader, Kurgan.

sub_scenes.title: The Caliph's Mission and Desert Journey
sub_scenes.description: This scene introduces Hassan and his mission assigned by the Caliph to rescue a kidnapped woman from the Tartars, beginning his journey into the desert.

narrative_arcs.title: Setting off to Confront the Tartars
Oasis Discovery: Trail of the Tartars
Encounter and Warning in the Desert

sub_scenes.title: Infiltration and Rescue Attempt
sub_scenes.description: This scene depicts Hassan infiltrating the Tatar camp, searching for the kidnapped woman, and making contact, leading to confrontation.

sub_scenes.title: Kurgan's Challenge and Honorable Resolution
sub_scenes.description: This scene culminates in Hassan facing Kurgan's challenge, fighting his warriors, and ultimately achieving a honorable resolution and rescuing the woman.

narrative_arcs.title: Internal Resolve and Desperate Need to Win
Signal for Contest and Hassan's Strategy
Plea for Mercy and Honorable Agreement
Imminent Departure and a Parting Kiss
A Fine Reward and Continued Journey
